name: Root Hacker!
description:
Root Hacker is an exciting and challenging 2.5D puzzle game that requires players to use their problem-solving skills to succeed. As the player, you are tasked with hacking into a computer server and making your way to the Root in order to extract valuable information.

The gameplay involves dragging and placing commands onto a board, which then commands your bots to complete specific tasks. However, the system is guarded and the further you progress, the more challenges you will encounter. This means that you must use your wits and strategy to overcome the puzzles and outmanoeuvre enemy bots that have been deployed by the server's owner to stop you.

As you play through the levels, you will need to think creatively and use all of your hacking skills in order to make it to the Root and complete your mission.
